name: Dolce Italia Cheese Ravioli
description: Four Cheese ravioli is a tender Italian Dumpling stuffed with melty and gooey assorted Imported Italian cheeses, easy to cook in just a few minutes and contains no preservatives, dyes or sugar. Please note that our team at Cargills Online has taken all the necessary precautions in order to deliver this item in its frozen state to your doorstep.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
